title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path
OB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a report design in the folder $project/test.
3. Include a library from the folder $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
